attributes.action: Make mental abuse which causes adult suicide an offence with sufficiant evidence
attributes.additional_details: Please help me raise awareness of this abuse and to help families, loved ones get justice.
attributes.background: My heart is broken as to how cruel human beings can be to another human, by doing this petition i feel this is my way of giving support to people that have suffered the loss of a loved one/friend/relative, that as endured the emotion of mental bullying with sufficiant evidence.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. 

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do. For example, you could ask for "murder" to be redefined in law, so that it includes cases where mental abuse has caused someone to take their own life. 

You'll need to give your full name to start a petition.
